title: BATTERY ENERGY STORAGE SYSTEM ENCLOSURE
fullText:
dedicated enclosure containing all the components of a battery energy storage system including, but not limited to, PCE, battery system(s) and all the necessary auxiliary equipment that is compatible with the installation location and the associated BESS components
Note 1 to entry: The enclosure may also house ancillary equipment related to the photovoltaic (PV) array connection or diesel generator connection.
